name: Projects
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.

This is the home page for the various computer science applications and projects I've worked on and completed over the past few years.  


### Projects
##[Verbalizer](http://www.therandompc.me/verbalizer) - A Cross-platform Java application for Latin Students
This is a piece of software specifically designed for the classroom to help teach beginning Latin students the fundamentals of declining nouns and conjugating verbs in the Latin language.


### Authors and Contributors
I, Eric Nolting (@TheRandomPC), am currently an undergraduate student at the University of Rochester studying Computer Science, and Physics and Astronomy. 


### Contact
My main website (this is just my project page) is [therandompc.com](http://www.therandompc.com/).
I can be contacted by email at eric.nolting@therandompc.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
